metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41500 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Incomplete string comparison vulnerability exits in cvxopt.org cvxop <=1.2.6 in APIs (cvxopt.cholmod.diag, cvxopt.cholmod.getfactor,cvxopt.cholmod.solve, cvxopt.cholmod.spsolve), which allows attackers toconduct Denial of Service attacks by construct fake Capsule objects.

criterions.comment: cvxopt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
